title: When is the Community Going to Finally Speak up about Blitzcrank?

embed.description: LoL Statistics, Builds, Runes, Masteries, Skill Orders, Counters and Matchups for Blitzcrank when played Support. Statistics include Blitzcrank's Win Rate, Play Rate and Ban Rate. Counters include who Blitzcrank Support is Strong or Weak Against.

body:
Let me start off by saying this is not a QQ thread.  I don't hate {{champion:53}} ( I actually think he's adorable).

As a support main, I hate talking about certain supports that need to be nerfed. I've played them all, and I love it when supports are powerful and impactful in the game.

Except when they are powerful at the expense of every other support/champion {{champion:53}} .

This is not a QQ thread. I just feel like people have a fear of talking about Blitz's power level because they feel like if they lost to Blitz it means THEY played badly. People say "just learn to dodge hook noob." Alright, if it's that easy to beat Blitzcrank, how do you explain that his win rate in Platinum elo and higher is HIGHER than in lower divisions? 

Not only is his win rate the highest of all supports, but he has *no* losing matchups *at all*. 

Not a single ADC/support can consistently manage to have a win rate of 50 percent or higher against Blitz (Sivir and Leona are the only two that come close; *sometimes* they reach 50 percent). 

Riot, this really is an issue that needs to be addressed. Blitz is killing not only champion diversity (why pick {{champion:1}}  or {{champion:63}}  or {{champion:43}}  or {{champion:40}}  or {{champion:267}}  or {{champion:16}}  or {{champion:37}} or {{champion:26}} or {{champion:143}}  or {{champion:117}}  if Blitz is open? If you pick any of these supports you are going into lane at an automatic disadvantage if they pick blitz) but Blitz is killing STRATEGIC diversity bot lane as well. His presence automatically makes bot lane an all-or-nothing full kill lane situation, and it gets old *very* fast.

I don't know precisely what about Blitzcrank should be nerfed. Perhaps make his grab travel time slightly longer? Make his W give less movement speed and/or attack speed? Make his ult do less damage? Nerf the CD on his passive? Have his passive actually consume mana? 

Just throwing ideas out there. Again, this is not a QQ thread, and I don't think {{champion:53}}  should get a {{champion:45}}  or {{champion:38}}  treatment, but please, Riot, reduce his power level a bit.

Most people say to just dodge his q, but its way more than that. A good blitz player can easily land a hook no problem even if someone is good at dodging. As a bot lane main, i can confirm this. The only way to really 100% to play around blitz is to prevent him from getting into position. He adds a ton of pressure on a lane, especially without a morgana, sivir. 

Here is why. A good blitz will just run around the minion wave with w, get close, and q. The hit box is so wide on q that its almost impossible to dodge at that point unless the blitz just misses or the adc has a dash/flash up. The adc at that point has to just walk away from lane. in team fights, the ability to separate someone by a good distance from his/her team, knock them up, silence them, all while doing a ton of dmg if the build is right.

I think the best way to change blitz in theshort-run is to lower his q width by a bit, make his w ramp up to speed instead of instant speed, and maybe reduce his ult dmg (but i would change his e to ap%, instead of %ad on hit).
